Text.val: 22.11.2011 SH SCR16880 Added test on DCMC_MARK_CODE=GNRL_MARKCODLIMDENIED
13.05.2011 SH SCR16448 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
08.02.2006 JJ SCR7798 Added DEBB limit exceeded updates
15.01.2003 JJ SCR2785 call create DCMC only if not all amounts are 0
05.08.2002 JJ SCR1831 dropped test on DEBC_DEBHBUYGROUP >0
25.07.2002 JJ SCR1609 fixed check disputes (not null or .. ==> not null and...)
23.07.2002 SCR1609 SH Add two new fields DCMC_DISPUTESGROSSC / DCMC_DISPUTESGROS
and init DCMC_DISPUTESGROSSC with the sum of INVA_ACTAFACTORING if
<<<<<<<<<<<<This Program has a Range in STRG+H >>>>>>>>>>

SQL_STMT_U.val: update :1/DEBB set DEBB_ACTINVALIMITEXCEEDEDH = 0, DEBB_ACTINVALIMITEXCEEDEDC = 0 with NC

update :1/DEBB set (DEBB_ACTINVALIMITEXCEEDEDH, DEBB_ACTINVALIMITEXCEEDEDC) = (select sum(DCMC_SPECIALACCOUNTH), sum(DCMC_SPECIALACCOUNTC) from :1/DCMC where DCMC_DEBC_NO = DEBB_DEBC_NO and DCMC_MARK_CODE in (:2)) where exists (select * from :1/DCMC where DCMC_DEBC_NO = DEBB_DEBC_NO and DCMC_MARK_CODE in (:2)) with NC
